operations.notes: Returns a list a submitted blueprints.
operations.summary: Returns a list of submitted blueprints.

parameters.name: application_file_name
parameters.description: File name of yaml containing the "main" blueprint.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Binary form of the tar gzipped blueprint directory

operations.notes: Submitted blueprint should be a tar gzipped directory containing the blueprint.
operations.summary: Submit a new blueprint.

operations.notes: deletes a blueprint by its id.
Returns a blueprint by its id.
operations.summary: Returns a blueprint by its id.

parameters.name: application_file_name
parameters.description: File name of yaml containing the "main" blueprint.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Binary form of the tar gzipped blueprint directory

operations.notes: Submitted blueprint should be a tar gzipped directory containing the blueprint.
operations.summary: Submit a new blueprint with a blueprint_id.

operations.notes: Returns a blueprint's source by the blueprint's id.
operations.summary: Returns a blueprint by its id.

operations.notes: Validates a given blueprint.
operations.summary: Validates a given blueprint.

operations.notes: Returns the execution state by its id.
operations.summary: Returns the execution state by its id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: json with an action key. Legal values for action are: [cancel]

operations.notes: Modifies a running execution state (currently, only cancel is supported)
operations.summary: Modify a running execution state.

operations.notes: Returns a list existing deployments.
operations.summary: Returns a list of existing deployments.

operations.notes: Returns a deployment by its id.
operations.summary: Returns a deployment by its id.

operations.notes: Created a new deployment of the given blueprint.
operations.summary: Creates a new deployment

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return reachable state for the nodes.

operations.notes: Returns a list of executions related to the provided deployment.
operations.summary: Returns a list of executions related to the provided deployment.

operations.notes: Executes the provided workflow under the given deployment context.
operations.summary: Execute a workflow

operations.notes: Returns a list of workflows related to the provided deployment.
operations.summary: Returns a list of workflows related to the provided deployment.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return state for the nodes.

operations.notes: Returns an object containing nodes associated with this deployment.
operations.summary: Returns an object containing nodes associated with this deployment.

parameters.name: runtime
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return runtime properties.

operations.notes: Returns node state/runtime properties according to the provided query parameters.
operations.summary: Gets node runtime or reachable state.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Node state updated keys/values and state version

operations.notes: Update node runtime state. Expecting the request body to be a dictionary containing both 'runtime_info' - which is theupdated keys/values information (possibly partial update), and 'state_version', which is used for optimistic locking during the update
operations.summary: Updates node runtime state.

operations.notes: Put node runtime state (state will be entirely replaced) with the provided dictionary of keys and values.
operations.summary: Puts node runtime state.

operations.notes: Returns a list of events for the provided ElasticSearch query. The response format is as ElasticSearch response format.
operations.summary: Returns events for the provided ElasticSearch query

operations.summary: Returns events for the provided ElasticSearch query

operations.notes: Returns results from the storage for the provided ElasticSearch query. The response format is as ElasticSearch response format.
operations.summary: Returns results for the provided ElasticSearch query
